description: Run the new and existing unit tests to validate the Openrouter API wrapper enhancements.

instructions: Navigate to the root directory of the AIWhisperer project.
Ensure the Python environment is correctly set up with dependencies installed (e.g., `pip install -r requirements.txt`).
Execute the unit tests specifically designed for the advanced features: `pytest tests/unit/test_openrouter_advanced_features.py`.
Execute the existing unit tests for the Openrouter API wrapper to check for regressions: `pytest tests/unit/test_openrouter_api.py tests/unit/test_openrouter_api_detailed.py`.
Collect and report the output from the test runs, including the number of tests run and the pass/fail status for each test file.
constraints: Do not modify any source code or test files.
Only use standard Python testing tools (pytest).
validation_criteria: The test execution report is generated and includes the status of all specified test files.
